com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.attribute

Interface Timestamp

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<Timestamp>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardTimestamp

    public interface Timestamp
extends Comparable<Timestamp>
    A point in time as measured in elapsed time since UNIX Epoch time
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TimeUnit getNativeUnit()
      Returns the native unit used by this Timestamp.
      long sinceEpoch(TimeUnit unit)
      Returns the length of time since UNIX epoch in the given TimeUnit.

      • getNativeUnit

        TimeUnit getNativeUnit()
        Returns the native unit used by this Timestamp. The actual time is specified in this unit of time.
